description:
Have you ever wanted to build your own product or invention?

Would you like to turn your product idea into an actual product?

Would you like to know how to design, manufacture and sell your very own product?

This course will help first time inventors, makers, and entrepreneurs solve all these questions and more. We teach concepts around Developing Your Idea, Project Management, 2D Designs, 3D Designs, Safety Certifications, Patents, Marketing, Prototyping, Packaging Designs, Tooling, Molds, Manufacturing, Sales, and more.

In this business of building your product, we will teach you things to watch out for, and how to decide what components are best to get your idea out of your head and into a minimal viable product. With the right resources, you will be able to take your MVP and show it to potential customers.

We'll teach you the easiest and most cost effective ways to execute your idea. We'll introduce service providers such as shapeways and fiverr. This will help you speed up your project. We'll also educate you about platforms such as alibaba and Shopify.

We'll go through the steps of building your first product piece by piece, with great attention to detail.

We'll discuss working with Shenzhen as opposed to other manifesting areas and mention the pros and cons of offshore manufacturing. We'll then go through the process of setting up your fulfillment systems, payment processing and dealing with distributors, ecommerce, wholesale buyers, and more.

We here at FRESHeTECH Consulting will continually offer more content within this course, as we work on products within our company.

In our first installment, we'll walk you through the process of building a portable sticker battery for your phone. As I've mentioned, this course will be continually evolving. We want to cater this course to our students' needs, so please feel free to contact us via email with questions and suggestions.

What am I going to get from this course?

  • Over 20 lectures and 3.5 hours of content
  • Learn the steps required to build a consumer electronic product and build a business around it.
  • Build a portable rechargeable sticker battery from scratch!
  • Learn how to build a MVP, learn what is required to take your concept from idea to actual product ready for sell.
title: Design and Manufacture Your Own Consumer Products
